title: Client problem
body:
Ever since the patch 7.13 was released, my client's been performing slower (despite enabling Low-Spec Mode). It could be my potato computer or something.
And then, my client occasionally gets bugsplats and keeps automatically restarting the client, even when I'm in game.

replies.body: If your client keeps getting bugsplats as well as running relatively slowly, you might have had some files get damaged during the update process. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with **Force Repatch** really quickly and let me know if that helps!
